titleStmt.title: The church-history of Ethiopia wherein among other things, the two great splendid Roman missions into that empire are placed in their true light : to which are added, an epitome of the Dominican history of that church, and an account of the practices and conviction of Maria of the Annunciation, the famous nun of Lisbon / composed by Michael Geddes ...
titleStmt.author: Geddes, Michael, 1650?-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
